job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsPursuing an undergraduate or graduate degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical and Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences, or related field of study.
• At the end of the internship, you must return to school to continue your education or the internship must be the last requirement for you to graduate.

• Minimum QualificationsBS Electrical/Computer Engineering or equivalent5+ years industry experienceElectrical engineering fundamentals including analog and high speed digital designBroad experience across different applications and technologiesExperience in design of complex system architectures.

job_title: Hardware Systems Design and Modeling Electrical Engineer - iPhone
job_description: • Minimum QualificationsBS Electrical/Computer Engineering or equivalent5+ years industry experienceExperienced with Model Based Systems Engineering (MBSE) in Simulink, Cameo, or similarElectrical engineering fundamentals including analog and high speed digital designBroad experience across different applications and technologies.

• Complete required safety training and conduct all work in accordance with safety policies.
• Improve equipment availability by investigating chronic tool problems and finding solutions.
• Must be enrolled in an AAS in Mechatronics, Robotics, Engineering Technology, or related field of study.
• Encouraged completion of degree between December 2026 and June 2027 Mechanical proficiency with the ability to understand and troubleshoot mechanical systems.
• Knowledge of AC/DC circuits and basic fundamentals of electricity.
• Intermediate PC skills Less than 2 years 2 - 4 years 4 - 8 years.
